Publication Title: Intratumoral drug-releasing microdevices allow in situ high-throughput pharmaco phenotyping in patients with gliomas
Publication Authors: Pierpaolo Peruzzi, Christine Dominas, Geoffrey Fell, Joshua D Bernstock, Sarah Blitz, Debora Mazzetti, Mykola Zdioruk, Hassan Y Dawood, Daniel V Triggs, Sebastian W Ahn, Sharath K Bhagavatula, Shawn M Davidson, Zuzana Tatarova, Michael Pannell, Kyla Truman, Anna Ball, Maxwell P Gold, Veronika Pister, Ernest Fraenkel, E Antonio Chiocca, Keith L Ligon, Patrick Y Wen, Oliver Jonas
Publication Abstract: The lack of reliable predictive biomarkers to guide effective therapy is a major obstacle to the advancement of therapy for high-grade gliomas, particularly glioblastoma (GBM), one of the few cancers whose prognosis has not improved over the past several decades.
